test.name: BZ24253.TC.010
test.description: Validate "logscan -loganon -DOBFUSCATE=ContextElement1,ContextElement2 -in *.log" obfuscates all the occurences of the values of "ContextElement1" and "ContextElement2" context elements in "ContextElement1", "ContextElement2" / other context variables [The obfuscated data should have the same length as its original]

modifyContext.name: Irrelevant_Context1
modifyContext.value: 'Phishing: Fraudsters phish in order to gain confidential data from unsuspecting internet users. An example is account information from online auctioneers or access data for internet banking.'
